name: PCKG_DOC_SEQUENCE
body_snippet:
package pckg_doc_sequence is

  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 30-08-2003 12:18:54 PM
  -- Purpose : Manage document sequence generation in all transactions
  
  -- warnings ----
     warn_sequence_is_already_used NUMBER(1); -- 1 Yes, 2 No
     
     -- if this var is set to Yes then then form should display a warning dialog box 
     -- that previous number is already accuired by another user
     --  
  -----------
   PROCEDURE get_max_doc_no(parm_inv_book_id NUMBER,parm_date DATE,parm_doc_no IN OUT NUMBER,parm_seq_det_id IN OUT NUMBER)    ;
   PROCEDURE update_max_doc_no(parm_inv_book_id NUMBER,parm_date DATE,parm_doc_no IN OUT NUMBER,parm_seq_det_id IN OUT NUMBER) ;

end pckg_doc_sequence;
